IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: DEVELOPMENT HOMES, INC. IS COMMITTED TO THE PROVISION OF QUALITY COMMUNITY BASED SUPPORT AND TRAINING TO PERSONS WITH DISABILITIES ENABLING THEM TO MAXIMIZE THEIR INDIVIDUAL POTENTIAL AND REALIZE THEIR PERSONAL DREAMS.
IRS990.MissionDesc: DEVELOPMENT HOMES, INC. IS COMMITTED TO THE PROVISION OF QUALITY COMMUNITY BASED SUPPORT AND TRAINING TO PERSONS WITH DISABILITIES ENABLING THEM TO MAXIMIZE THEIR INDIVIDUAL POTENTIAL AND REALIZE THEIR PERSONAL DREAMS.
IRS990.Desc: GROUP LIVING ARRANGEMENTS FOR PERSONS WITH DEVELOPMENTAL AND OTHER RELATED DISABILITIES: DHI MANAGED AND OPERATED 7 GROUP HOMES FOR PERSONS WITH DEVELOPMENTAL AND PHYSICAL DISABILITIES. OF THESE, 3 ARE ICF/IDD HOMES INCLUDING ONE FOR CHILDREN AND 4 ARE DD WAIVER GROUP HOMES FOR ADULTS. A TOTAL OF 42 PERSONS ARE SERVED IN GROUP HOME SETTING.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: SUPPORTED LIVING ARRANGEMENTS FOR PERSONS WITH DEVELOPMENTAL AND OTHER RELATED DISABILITIES: 75 PEOPLE RECEIVED SUPPORT TO LIVE MORE INDEPENDENTLY IN THEIR OWN APARTMENTS. PROGRAMS ARE OFFERED BASED ON THE AMOUNT OF SUPERVISION AND SUPPORT NEEDED BY THE PERSON SERVED. THE RESIDENTIAL HABILITATION SERVICES ARE SPECIFICALLY DESIGNED TO MEET EACH PERSON'S NEED FOR ASSISTANCE, AND CAN PROVIDE 24 HOURS A DAY SUPPORT. THE INDEPENDENT HABILITATION PROGRAM OFFERS CASE MANAGEMENT SERVICES AND A MINIMAL NUMBER OF DIRECT CONTACT HOURS PER WEEK FOR THOSE INDIVIDUALS WHO HAVE ACHIEVED GREATER LEVELS OF FUNCTIONING AND INDEPENDENCE.

ProgSrvcAccomActy3Grp.Desc: EMPLOYMENT AND COMMUNITY SUPPORT SERVICES FOR PERSONS WITH DEVELOPMENTAL AND OTHER RELATED DISABILITIES: THE PRE-VOCATIONAL AND EMPLOYMENT PROGRAMS HELPED 50 INDIVIDUALS FIND, ATTAIN, AND KEEP PAYING JOBS IN THE COMMUNITY. JOB COACHES SUPPORTED PERSONS TO LEARN AND PERFORM WORK DUTIES TO MEET THE STANDARDS OF THE EMPLOYER. OVER 30 PEOPLE WERE OFFERED DAY HABILITATION SERVICES THAT TAILORED INTERVENTION LEVELS TO MEET A FULL RANGE OF ABILITIES ENABLING THEM TO LEARN SOCIAL SKILLS AND ENGAGE IN A MEANINGFUL WAY IN THE COMMUNITY.

ProgSrvcAccomActyOtherGrp.Desc: OTHER PROGRAM SERVICES INCLUDES: FAMILY SUPPORT SERVICES FOR PERSONS WITH DEVELOPMENTAL AND OTHER RELATED DISABILITIES: SUPPORT AND TRAINING TO FAMILIES AND CHILDREN WAS PROVIDED TO A TOTAL OF 30 FAMILIES. SERVICES ARE OFFERED IN THE CHILD'S FAMILY HOME EITHER WITH OR WITHOUT THE PARENT OR PRIMARY CARE GIVER PRESENT.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATIONS ENDOWMENT CONSISTS OF FUNDS ESTABLISHED TO PROVIDE SUPPORT FOR THE ORGANIZATION TO CARRY OUT ITS ROLE AND MISSION. THE FUNDS WERE DESIGNATED BY THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS TO FUNCTION AS ENDOWMENTS. AS REQUIRED BY GENERALLY ACCEPTED ACCOUNTING PRINCIPLES, NET ASSETS ASSOCIATED WITH ENDOWMENT FUNDS, INCLUDING FUNDS DESIGNATED BY THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS TO FUNCTION AS ENDOWMENTS, ARE CLASSIFIED AND REPORTED BASED ON THE EXISTENCE OR ABSENCE OF DONOR-IMPOSED RESTRICTIONS.

THE ORGANIZATION IS A NOT-FOR-PROFIT ORGANIZATION THAT IS EXEMPT FROM INCOME TAXES UNDER SECTION 501(C)(3) OF THE INTERNAL REVENUE CODE AND CLASSIFIED BY THE INTERNAL REVENUE SERVICE AS OTHER THAN A PRIVATE FOUNDATION. THE ORGANIZATION'S POLICY IS TO EVALUATE THE LIKELIHOOD THAT ITS UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS WILL PREVAIL UPON EXAMINATION BASED ON THE EXTENT TO WHICH THOSE POSITIONS HAVE SUBSTANTIAL SUPPORT WITHIN THE INTERNAL REVENUE CODE AND REGULATIONS, REVENUE RULINGS, COURT DECISIONS, AND OTHER EVIDENCE. IT IS THE OPINION OF MANAGEMENT THAT THE ORGANIZATION HAS NO UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS THAT WOULD BE SUBJECT TO CHANGE UPON EXAMINATION.

IRS990ScheduleG.GamingManagerServicesProvTxt: MANAGES THE GAMING ACTIVITIES OF THE ORGANIZATION. THIS INCLUDES RECORD KEEPING, MONEY COUNTING, HIRING WORKERS, PURCHASES GAMES TO BE PLAYED.
